results.description: Hull City midfielder Jon Toral will be out for about three months after having knee surgery.
results.title: Jon Toral: Hull City midfielder out for about three months after knee surgery

results.description: Jake Livermore scores the winner as West Brom stay top of the Championship with a resilient victory over in-form Hull City.
results.title: Hull City 0-1 West Bromwich Albion: Jake Livermore goal keeps Baggies top

results.description: Hull City make it three Championship victories in a row with a clinical display against an out-of-sorts Fulham side.
results.title: Fulham 0-3 Hull City: Jarrod Bowen scores 10th goal of season as Tigers win

results.description: Hull City secure back-to-back league wins for the first time this season as Jarrod Bowen's second-half double floors Derby.
results.shortTitle: Bowen double helps Tigers sink Derby
results.title: Hull City 2-0 Derby County: Bowen brace earns Tigers win

results.description: Josh Magennis and Jarrod Bowen give 10-man Hull City a second away win of the season as they beat Nottingham Forest.
results.shortTitle: Magennis & Bowen give Hull win at Forest
results.title: Nottingham Forest 1-2 Hull City: Josh Magennis and Jarrod Bowen give 10-man Hull victory

results.description: Ebere Ezeâ€™s late penalty double secures QPR's first victory at Hull for almost half a century as they come from behind to win.
results.shortTitle: Eze penalty double earns QPR win over Hull
results.title: Hull City 2-3 QPR: Ebere Eze's penalty double seals Rangers win over Tigers

thumbnail.altText: Eze has netted six goals this season

results.description: Cheltenham's on-loan Hull defender Jacob Greaves wins September's EFL Young Player of the Month award.
results.shortTitle: Greaves thriving under Robins boss Duff
results.title: Jacob Greaves: Cheltenham Town & Hull City youngster shining under Michael Duff

results.description: Huddersfield Town record back-to-back wins for the first time since April as they beat Hull City 3-0 in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Bacuna inspires Huddersfield win over Hull
results.title: Huddersfield Town 3-0 Hull City: Juninho Bacuna inspires Terriers to second victory

results.description: Tom Eaves scores his first Hull City goal to inflict the first defeat of Garry Monk's reign as Sheffield Wednesday manager.
results.shortTitle: Eaves' first Hull goal beats Wednesday
results.title: Hull City 1-0 Sheffield Wednesday: Garry Monk suffers first defeat as Owls boss

results.description: Cardiff City are still without an away win in the Championship but rescue a point at Hull in entertaining 2-2 draw.
results.title: Hull City 2-2 Cardiff City

thumbnail.altText: Danny Ward celebrates his late equaliser

results.description: Goals from Kevin Stewart, Kamil Grosicki and a Dan Potts own goal give Hull City a thumping with at Luton.
results.shortTitle: Hull ease to victory at Luton
results.title: Luton Town 0-3 Hull City: Kevin Stewart and Kamil Grosicki help Tigers to victory

results.description: A newly promoted team with an Englishman at left-back are shaking up the established order in the Portuguese top-flight and sitting top of the league.
results.shortTitle: The minnows leading the way in Portugal
results.title: Famalicao: The minnows with an English left-back who are leading the way in Portugal

results.description: Teenager Joe Gelhardt's first goal in professional football rescues a point for Wigan at fellow strugglers Hull City.
results.shortTitle: Teenager Gelhardt earns Wigan point at Hull
results.title: Hull City 2-2 Wigan Athletic: Teenager Joe Gelhardt earns point for visitors

results.description: Hull City sign Hungary striker Norbert Balogh, who was a free agent after leaving Italian club Palermo.
results.title: Norbert Balogh: Hull City sign Hungary international on free-agent deal

results.description: Hull's Angus MacDonald thanks the "football family" for their support after being diagnosed with bowel cancer.
results.title: Angus MacDonald: Hull defender thankful for support after bowel cancer diagnosis

thumbnail.altText: Angus MacDonald in action for Hull City

results.description: Hull City defender Angus MacDonald is diagnosed with the early stages of bowel cancer.
results.title: Angus MacDonald: Hull City defender diagnosed with early stages of bowel cancer

results.description: Hull City striker Nouha Dicko joins Dutch side Vitesse Arnhem on loan until the end of the season.
results.shortTitle: Hull striker Dicko joins Vitesse on loan
results.title: Nouha Dicko: Hull City striker joins Vitesse Arnhem on loan

thumbnail.altText: Nouha Dicko in action for Hull

results.description: Kamil Grosicki scores with an astonishing 40-yard free-kick to earn nine-man Hull City a point at Millwall.
results.shortTitle: Grosicki stunner secures draw for Hull
results.title: Millwall 1-1 Hull City: Kamil Grosicki gives Tigers point at The Den

thumbnail.altText: Grosicki was also on target in Hull's 2-2 draw at the Den last season

results.description: Republic of Ireland midfielder David Meyler says he has been left with "no option" but to retire.
results.shortTitle: Knee injuries force Meyler to retire
results.title: David Meyler: Republic of Ireland midfielder retires at 30

results.description: Alan Browne nets the winning penalty for Preston as they beat Hull on spot-kicks to secure progress to the EFL Cup third round.
results.shortTitle: Browne sends Preston through in shootout
results.title: Preston North End 2-2 Hull City: Alan Browne sends North End through in shootout
